title: Reveal Ivern now, or else...
body: ...or else my f5 key isn't going to survive this day.

replies.body:
We're willing to take that risk!





Also, as Ace of Eden's posted below, there's now a video of his gameplay on the LoL Facebook page. Edit: Posted above sorry.
Woa, I thought Rioters stayed away from Memes&Games O.o
I usually just follow the Gameplay board, occasionally I'll do a quick skin through the new posts from all the boards though just in case something interesting leaps out :).

nerf yasuo.
nerf him until he becomes a minion skin.

Sh...

Don't scare away the Meddler. This is a rare appearance.

Anyone recording this rare appearance for the Boards Nature Documentary?

We need more than just swaths of NaCl.
Was that because of my cookie post or are there other reasons involved?

Firstly you meant skim

And secondly he has a root lol I{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  approve
can you please explain to me how he takes damage from the jungle? Does he even take damage from the jungle?
He sacrifices some of his health and mana in order to set jungle camps free (gaining XP and gold in the process).

Can't wait to see if his passive works if he's a Morde clone.

Every new champion release brings with them a bunch of new Children of the Grave interactions.

Jhin's permanent 4th shot
Kled clones not having a cd on regaining skaarl
and so on :9
there is a lock out though on the Skaarl thing
It was a bug when he was first released.

No it's not a bug it's intended

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Kled/Abilities

-" If reuniting outside of base Skaarl gains Frayed Nerves, and a Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard dismounted Kled will not be able to restore Skaarl's Courage for a brief period of time."
You are oblivious... Metal was talking about KLED GHOST, not the champion in general...

Well, it doesn't when he's a Morde clone.
Or maybe he's bugged.

Hell, Morde might just be one of the buggiest champions at the moment.
I can't wait until I can leap-E the enemies for a free multi-man taunt and Daisy knockup.
my personal favorite is getting a kindred hunt in the enemy jungle. I can't believe you didn't mention that!

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QnUcrYpx,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-20T18:48:40.203+0000)

> Can't wait to see if his passive works if he's a Morde clone.

> Jhin's permanent 4th shot
> Kled clones not having a cd on regaining skaarl

was actually unaware of the skaarl one.
wait wait wait wait wait wait wait...THAT"S FUCKING AWESOME! Who thought of that?
They don't hit you if you don't hit them, so I guess his clear is all sunshine and rainbows. Riot did something weird. Again.
Guessing there was a problem with the actual page that talks about all his abilities?
I believe so. Should be live pretty soon though.
this is the last champ in 2016?
:o A Rioter said my name! :D
Awesome! Can we expect a reveal page soon? I want to know what the f I was watching x)

https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/videos/10157715969660556/

From League's Facebook page

HE'S A GLORIOUS JUNGLER.  THIS GUY LOOKS AMAZING.

This is the kind of interactive kit we're looking for Rito. 

Rumble's_Intense_Training_Of_Programmable_Lab_Suits

More.
LOOK AT HOW HE WALKS {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Oh my god and I thought Jhin's walk cycle was glorious.
Holy shit??
Yes! I knew he was going to be a jungler! He makes brush!? He has a golem pet!!! OMG yes!!!!!!!
